candidate Profile Description.summary: With 1 year of experience as a Jr Data Analyst at AVN Infotech, Jainam Jagani has led cross-functional analysis resulting in a 15% reduction in customer churn and 25% increase in retention rate. He implemented data quality checks, achieving 95% accuracy, and collaborated to reduce data processing time by 30%.

education.degree: Master of Science in Data Analytical Engineering
Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology
education.institution: Thakur College of Engineering and Technology, Mumbai University

responsibilities: Led cross-functional analysis of sales data; uncovered insights leading to 15% customer churn reduction & 25% increase in retention rate.
Implemented data quality checks and data cleansing processes, resulting in a 95% accuracy rate for data analysis.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop data modeling strategies, resulting in a 30% reduction in data processing time for the company.
Demonstrated expertise in various domains to develop and implement innovative solutions, leading to a 50% reduction in project timelines.
Developed Data Pipelines using ML techniques, leading to 15% improvement in data quality and 25% cost savings.

programming: Familiarity with C++ or Scala (for handling large-scale data)
database: Data warehousing (Snowflake, Amazon Redshift, Google BigQuery)

projects.title: Predictive Modeling of HCV (Hepatitis C Virus) Categories using R
technologies: predictive modeling (random forests, logistic regression, K nearest neighbour, Multinomial Logistic Modelling)
achievements: Led a research project to predict HCV category progression, exploring feature importance and model performance for early disease detection.
Conducted EDA, utilized R for predictive modeling (random forests, logistic regression, KNN, Multinomial Logistic model), and evaluated model performance through cross-validation.
Achieved impressive model accuracies with Random Forest (96%), Multinomial Logistic Modeling (95%), and K Nearest Neighbor (92%).

projects.title: Movie Recommendation System
achievements: Created a cutting-edge film suggestion system utilizing collaborative filtering and predictive modeling to boost user interaction on a streaming platform.
Achieved a high recommendation accuracy rate of 88%

volunteering_leadership.role: Member of Core Committee of College IT Department
achievements: Collaborated within dynamic cross-functional teams to strategize, coordinate, and execute a diverse range of technical and cultural festivals. Demonstrated adept project management abilities, ensuring seamless coordination and successful execution of events, highlighting organizational prowess and diligence.
Leveraged strong communication skills to effectively engage with peers, promote activities, and cultivate a vibrant tech-centric community, fostering collaboration and driving collective success.
